description: Given an integer array hours representing times in hours, return an integer denoting the number of pairs i, j where i < j and hours[i] + hours[j] forms a complete day. A complete day is defined as a time duration that is an exact multiple of 24 hours. For example, 1 day is 24 hours, 2 days is 48 hours, 3 days is 72 hours, and so on.
